original_text: Look! The Lord God is sending a strong and powerful army to attack it. It comes like a strong storm of ice. Its wind destroys everything. It is like rain that pours down and causes a flood. He will knock down Ephraim's great city to the ground with his great power!
korean_text: 보라 주께 있는 강하고 힘 있는 자가 쏟아지는 우박 같이, 파괴하는 광풍 같이, 큰 물이 넘침 같이 손으로 그 면류관을 땅에 던지리니

sentences.original_text: The Lord God is sending a strong and powerful army
sentences.korean_translation: 주 하나님은 강하고 막강한 군대를 보내고 계신다

sentences.original_text: It comes like a strong storm of ice.
It is like rain that pours down
He will knock down Ephraim's great city
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 에브라임의 위대한 도시를 무너뜨릴 것이다

sentences.original_text: to the ground with his great power!
